A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Does it fuck up the lore ? Yes. Does it ruin Luke ? Kind of. Does it slap you on the face for being hyped up about the things The Force Awakens hyped up itself ? Yes it does. Does it have plot holes and tonal inconsistencies ? Yes it does. But since it is a very competently made\, well shot\, well choreographed spectacle that is enjoyable\, it gets a 3/5.which to me means it is above average but nothing to write home about.
